se.aphelion.assignment.ordermatcher

Class OrderBook

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.aphelion.assignment.ordermatcher.OrderBook

  • public class OrderBook
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the data structure of the project. It contains two ArrayList. One for sell and one for buy. Different operations in the ArrayList are perform according to business requirement.
